amendment.description: An amendment numbered 32 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to strike language that would prohibit closure of the Yucca Mountain project.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kihuen amendment (A030) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Kihuen.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Kihuen amendment (A030) Failed by voice vote.
